verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֬חַ׀ <S%H5329><s%> lam-natz-Tze-acho the chief Musician לִבְנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> [Tliv-nei-for the sons קֹ֬רַח <S%H7141><s%> Ko-rach of Korah מִזְמֽוֹר׃ <S%H4210><s%> miz-Mor. A Psalm רָצִ֣יתָ <S%H7521><s%> ra-Tzi-ta thou hast been favourable יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh LORD אַרְצֶ֑ךָ <S%H776><s%> 'ar-Tze-cha; unto thy land שַׁ֝֗בְתָּ <S%H7725><s%> ve-ta thou hast brought back; שְׁבוּת she-vut כשְׁבִ֣ית <S%H7622><s%> she-Vit captive קיַעֲקֹֽב׃ <S%H3290><s%> ya-'a-Ko. of Jacob

נָ֭שָׂאתָ <S%H5375><s%> Na-sa-ta Thou hast forgiven עֲוֹ֣ן <S%H5771><s%> 'a-Von the iniquity עַמֶּ֑ךָ <S%H5971><s%> 'am-Me-cha; of thy people כִּסִּ֖יתָ <S%H3680><s%> kis-Si-ta thou hast covered כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> chol all חַטָּאתָ֣ם <S%H2403><s%> chat-ta-Tam all their sin סֶֽלָה׃ <S%H5542><s%> Se-lah. Selah

אָסַ֥פְתָּ <S%H622><s%> 'a-Saf-ta Thou hast taken away כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> chol all עֶבְרָתֶ֑ךָ <S%H5678><s%> 'ev-ra-Te-cha; all thy wrath הֱ֝שִׁיב֗וֹתָ <S%H7725><s%> he-shi-Vo-ta, thou hast turned מֵחֲר֥וֹן <S%H2740><s%> me-cha-Ron [thyself] from the fierceness אַפֶּֽךָ׃ <S%H639><s%> 'ap-Pe-cha. of thine anger

שׁ֭וּבֵנוּ <S%H7725><s%> u-ve-nu Turn אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei us O God יִשְׁעֵ֑נוּ <S%H3468><s%> yish-'E-nu; of our salvation וְהָפֵ֖ר <S%H6565><s%> ve-ha-Fer toward us to cease כַּֽעַסְךָ֣ <S%H3708><s%> ka-'as-Cha and cause thine anger עִמָּֽנוּ׃ <S%H5973><s%> 'im-Ma-nu. toward

הַלְעוֹלָ֥ם <S%H5769><s%> hal-'o-Lam alway תֶּֽאֱנַף־ <S%H599><s%> te-'e-naf- Wilt thou be angry בָּ֑נוּ Ba-nu; תִּמְשֹׁ֥ךְ <S%H4900><s%> tim-Shoch continue אַ֝פְּךָ֗ <S%H639><s%> 'ap-pe-cha, thine anger לְדֹ֣ר <S%H1755><s%> le-Dor to all וָדֹֽר׃ <S%H1755><s%> va-Dor. to all

הֲֽלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> ha-lo- not אַ֭תָּה <S%H859><s%> 'At-tah Yourself תָּשׁ֣וּב <S%H7725><s%> ta-Shuv us again תְּחַיֵּ֑נוּ <S%H2421><s%> te-chai-Ye-nu; Wilt thou not revive וְ֝עַמְּךָ֗ <S%H5971><s%> ve-'am-me-cha, that thy people יִשְׂמְחוּ־ <S%H8055><s%> yis-me-chu- may rejoice בָֽךְ׃ Vach.

הַרְאֵ֣נוּ <S%H7200><s%> har-'E-nu Shew יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh O LORD חַסְדֶּ֑ךָ <S%H2617><s%> chas-De-cha; us thy mercy וְ֝יֶשְׁעֲךָ֗ <S%H3468><s%> ve-yesh-'a-cha, us thy salvation תִּתֶּן־ <S%H5414><s%> tit-ten- and grant לָֽנוּ׃ La-nu.

אֶשְׁמְעָ֗ה <S%H8085><s%> 'esh-me-'Ah, I will hear מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> mah- what יְדַבֵּר֮ <S%H1696><s%> ye-dab-Ber will speak הָאֵ֪ל׀ <S%H410><s%> ha-'El what God יְה֫וָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD כִּ֤י׀ <S%H3588><s%> ki for יְדַבֵּ֬ר <S%H1696><s%> ye-dab-Ber for he will speak שָׁל֗וֹם <S%H7965><s%> sha-Lom, peace אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to his עַמּ֥וֹ <S%H5971><s%> am-Mo unto his people וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> ve-'el- to his חֲסִידָ֑יו <S%H2623><s%> cha-si-Dav; and to his saints וְֽאַל־ <S%H408><s%> ve-'al- nay יָשׁ֥וּבוּ <S%H7725><s%> ya-Shu-vu but let them not turn again לְכִסְלָֽה׃ <S%H3690><s%> le-chis-Lah. to folly

אַ֤ךְ׀ <S%H389><s%> 'ach Surely קָר֣וֹב <S%H7138><s%> ka-Rov [is] nigh לִירֵאָ֣יו <S%H3373><s%> li-re-'Av them that fear יִשְׁע֑וֹ <S%H3468><s%> yish-'O; Surely his salvation לִשְׁכֹּ֖ן <S%H7931><s%> lish-Kon may dwell כָּב֣וֹד <S%H3519><s%> ka-Vod him that glory בְּאַרְצֵֽנוּ׃ <S%H776><s%> be-'ar-Tze-nu. in our land

חֶֽסֶד־ <S%H2617><s%> che-sed- Mercy וֶאֱמֶ֥ת <S%H571><s%> ve-'e-Met and truth נִפְגָּ֑שׁוּ <S%H6298><s%> nif-Ga-shu; are met together צֶ֖דֶק <S%H6664><s%> Tze-dek righteousness וְשָׁל֣וֹם <S%H7965><s%> ve-sha-Lom and peace נָשָֽׁקוּ׃ <S%H5401><s%> na-Sha-ku. have kissed

אֱ֭מֶת <S%H571><s%> 'E-met Truth מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> me-'E-retz of the earth תִּצְמָ֑ח <S%H6779><s%> titz-Mach; shall spring out וְ֝צֶ֗דֶק <S%H6664><s%> ve-Tze-dek, and righteousness מִשָּׁמַ֥יִם <S%H8064><s%> mish-sha-Ma-yim from heaven נִשְׁקָֽף׃ <S%H8259><s%> nish-Kaf. shall look down

גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> gam- Indeed יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh Yea the LORD יִתֵּ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> yit-Ten shall give הַטּ֑וֹב <S%H2896><s%> hat-Tov; [that which is] good וְ֝אַרְצֵ֗נוּ <S%H776><s%> ve-'ar-Tze-nu, and our land תִּתֵּ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> tit-Ten shall yield יְבוּלָֽהּ׃ <S%H2981><s%> ye-vu-Lah. her increase

צֶ֭דֶק <S%H6664><s%> Tze-dek Righteousness לְפָנָ֣יו <S%H6440><s%> le-fa-Nav before יְהַלֵּ֑ךְ <S%H1980><s%> ye-hal-Lech; shall go וְיָשֵׂ֖ם <S%H7760><s%> ve-ya-Sem him and shall set לְדֶ֣רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> le-De-rech [us] in the way פְּעָמָֽיו׃ <S%H6471><s%> pe-'a-Mav. of his steps
